nodes.text: The Meris were a tall humanoid race with dark blue skin, similar to the Teltiors, with whom they shared the planet Merisee. Distinguishing features included a strongly-pronounced eyebrow ridge, a slightly conical ridge on the top of their head, webbed hands with an opposable thumb and finger, inward-spiraling cartilage in the ear, and several thick folds of skin around the neck.
Some Meris were associated with the Cult of Those Who Redeem, though others were part of the Loag cult of assassins.
